title: nambiyiru manamE ennALum
sahitya:
nambiyiru manamE ennALum kuraivillAmal Alum kaDavuLuNDu


anupallavi

  tunbangaL vandAlum shuTrangaL kasandAlum inbam tarum idayayEshanaiyE dinam


caraNam    nAsham shei ajnAna pAshattai viDu viDu mOsam sheidiDu mOhA vESattai keDu keDu
nEsamellAm gOvindarAjaniDamE naDu dAsam sheyya shrInivAsan padattai tEDu
tannala aTriru sannata muTriru unnata nilai tarum pannaga shayananai
